title: Shadchan seeking setups
personal: I'm an amateur shadchan who wants to become a pro. Are you in search of love? Share the details with queerjews.com and let us help you!

title: I LOVE SHABBOS, YOU TOO?
personal: 31 y/o femme looking to fall in love ✨ with a shomer shabbos queer. Let's lie in the grass, go dancing, eat cake, stay up late talking and laughing and..I'm an artist, teacher, egal, communally living in NYC, tryna make the revolution irresistible. Hoping for squishy babies in the future.

title: SEEKING A LOVER AND MUSE
personal: to uncover earthly secrets we can only find together. Break my heart, or I’ll break yours. I’ll write you a song if you send me a poem. Married, poly, open to sex but it’s really not the point. Open to light torture, emotional or otherwise. Viet, transmasc, egal, 32 in NYC.

title: Anshel Looking for an Avigdor
personal: 29 YO NB Polyam Anshel looking for trans/queer chevruta who I can maybe kiss or be sweet to. Open to flirts (bonus if they are in Rashi Script), Mishna or Talmud chevruta, and queer platonic relationships.

title: Looking for a laid back DC queer babe
personal: I’m a doctor, your mom’s wet dream. Also free concierge rx for life, who doesn’t want that? Anyways looking for *monogamy*, prefer chapstick or masc leaning women. Must be able to curl up on the couch with my cat and watch a show with us. :) hoping for kids one day

title: Nice Jewish Boy On the loose
personal: M, 28, looking for another NJB to take over the world with. Modern Orthodox adjacent but open to all flavors of Judaism. Let's get a drink or come for a Shabbat meal and let's vibe!

title: 28F Seeks Hungry Top
personal: Looking for a long term partner who wants kids. Someone who shares my commitment to knowing about Judaism and being in a Jewish community but also shares my non-commitment to actually following the Torah. You might need to bully me a bit. I can feed you.

title: lover of land & Torah seeking same
personal: halakhic egal 29yo queer ND woman-ish NB who loves farming, ancestral practices, & Torah. as happy with hands in the dirt as tanning sheep hides as shteiging in the BM. life dream is a thriving, observant Jewish community living in direct relationship w land. looking for others to build that future together, especially a partner to build a family.
